hadiths.text: ‘Amir said:The people behind the imam should not say: “Allah listens to him who praises Him.” But they should say: “ Our Lord, to Thee be the praise.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا رَفَعَ رَأْسَهُ مِنَ الرُّكُوعِ
chapter.eng-name: What Should Be Said When One Raises His Head From The Ruku'
